name: Skystranded
description:
In Skystranded, your goal is to find your way home. Mysterious portals seem to be the key, but how can you activate them?

This is a VR game made for the 2nd Team Panoptes Jam (which we organised!). We decided to go back to VR to make a sun-drenched exploration game. Tested only on Oculus Rift S/Quest with Link so far!

The following people helped bring this project to life over 3 days:

Bastien Gorissen

Thomas Stassin

David Colignon

Ngân Pickery
